emails.content:
Hi Team,

I wanted to follow up on our discussion from yesterday's meeting. Please review the attached proposal and let me know your thoughts by end of week.

Best regards,
John

URGENT - ACTION REQUIRED

Please review and approve the budget proposal immediately. Deadline is today at 5 PM.

This is a high-priority item that requires your immediate attention.

CONGRATULATIONS! You have won $1,000,000!

Click here now to claim your prize: Claim Prize

Limited time offer! Act now!

Hey Sarah,

Are you free this weekend? A few of us are planning to go hiking on Saturday. Let me know if you'd like to join!

Cheers,
Mike
Meeting reminder: Team standup at 10 AM tomorrow.
